blogPost.title:
You can now buy the Kindle version of my book for just $2.99

Or you could buy that latte and never be able to retire

The choice is yours 

https://t.co/5WrDlMZA7R
blogPost.author: Ben Carlson

localize.full_text:
你现在只需花2.99美元就能买到我的书的Kindle版本

或者你可以买了那杯拿铁，永远不能退休

是你的选择

https://t.co/5WrDlMZA7R
